csw:Record.dct:abstract: This dataset represents electrical generation and distribution facilities for portions of Davis, Salt Lake, Utah, Wasatch, and Weber Counties. These data were digitized as part of State of Utah Comprehensive Emergency Earthquake Preparedness Program, 1986-1989.

csw:Record.dct:abstract: This data set represents springs in Utah. Several methods and agencies produced the data. The data represents Cartographic Feature Files (CFF) and Digital Line Graph (DLG) data collected by the US Forest Service and US Geological Survey.
csw:Record.dc:creator: Automated Geographic Reference Center (AGRC)
csw:Record.dc:description: This data set represents springs in Utah. Several methods and agencies produced the data. The data represents Cartographic Feature Files (CFF) and Digital Line Graph (DLG) data collected by the US Forest Service and US Geological Survey.

csw:Record.dct:abstract: This dataset depicts the Utah State Boundary as digitized from USGS 7.5 minute quad map series. The boundary should be coincident with the outer boundary of the SGID024.CountyBoundaries dataset.

csw:Record.dc:description: This dataset depicts the Utah State Boundary as digitized from USGS 7.5 minute quad map series. The boundary should be coincident with the outer boundary of the SGID024.CountyBoundaries dataset.

State
Boundary

csw:Record.dct:abstract: This layer contains data from the Geographic Names Information System (GNIS) which was developed by the USGS "to meet major national needs regarding geographic names and their standardization and dissemination". The data consist of point locations with corresponding feature names. All point entities are categorized by feature type. This data is representative of data from 2000 for mapping feature names
csw:Record.dc:creator: Automated Geographic Reference Center (AGRC)
